holidays.title: Asahna Bucha Day
holidays.description: Light your candles and your incense, and prune those lotus flowers. Asahna Bucha Day has arrived.

holidays.title: Colombia Independence Day
holidays.description: Join Colombians as they commemorate their independence, which sparked independent movements in parts of Latin America.

holidays.title: Crown Prince Haakon's Day
holidays.description: Prepare to learn more about the Crown Prince of Norway and the day that celebrates him.

holidays.title: Esala Full Moon Poya
holidays.description: Esala Full Moon Poya commemorates Buddha's first sermon, in which he uttered the Four Noble Truths.

holidays.title: Full Moon Day of Waso
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the first sermon of Lord Buddha!

holidays.title: International Chess Day
holidays.description: Chess lovers celebrate their favorite game today, in a tradition spanning more than 50 years.

holidays.title: International Snowdon Race
holidays.description: Best of luck to you if you’re competing in this 10-mile endurance run.

holidays.title: Lempira Day
holidays.description: Lempira Day is a celebration dedicated to the national hero of Honduras.

holidays.title: National Fortune Cookie Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Fortune Cookie Day to add some fun and excitement to your life!

holidays.title: National Lollipop Day
holidays.description: They come in many flavors but mostly fruit flavors for licking or biting.

holidays.title: NATIONAL PENNSYLVANIA DAY
holidays.description: Let us take advantage of this opportunity to honor Pennsylvania's rich heritage and accomplishments.

holidays.title: National Strawberry Rhubarb Wine Day
holidays.description: Celebrate by grabbing a glass of yummy Strawberry Rhubarb Wine and making a toast!

holidays.title: National Ugly Truck Contest Day
holidays.description: Wondering what a National Ugly Truck Contest Day would be like? Join us and discover.

holidays.title: Space Exploration Day
holidays.description: Join us as we embark on a mission to the moon for Space Exploration Day!

holidays.title: Toss Away the “Could Haves” and “Should Haves” Day
holidays.description: Take control of your future by avoiding dwelling on your past mistakes.

holidays.title: Women's Union Establishment Day
holidays.description: During this special celebration, help raise awareness of one of the many issues challenging women.

holidays.title: Woodie Wagon Day
holidays.description: Before metallic cars, there were woodie wagons. Let’s honor the great invention of the woodie wagon.

holidays.title: World Jump Day
holidays.description: Jumping to combat global warming? That’s what World Jump Day is all about.

holidays.title: Alycia Debnam-Carey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress’ potential knows no bounds and she has nowhere to go but up.

holidays.title: Chris Cornell’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was a famous rock singer and guitarist and an icon of the grunge movement.

holidays.title: Pepe’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented singer, songwriter, and actor, world domination is in view.

holidays.title: Pop Smoke’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper can rest in peace knowing he blessed the world with his talents.

holidays.title: Unpopular Edits’s Birthday
holidays.description: For all anime lovers out there, Unpopular Edits has the content that you enjoy the most.
